snippet: Major League Soccer, which has a reputation as a destination for aging stars, has made progress attracting promising young players from the Caribbean, Central America and South America in recent years.
abstract: Major League Soccer, which has a reputation as a destination for aging stars, has made progress attracting promising young players from the Caribbean, Central America and South America in recent years.
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer, which has a reputation as a destination for aging stars, has made progress attracting promising young players from the Caribbean, Central America and South America in recent years.

headline.seo: M.L.S. Seen as Steppingstone to Europe for Promising Young Players
headline.main: An Eye on Europe, but Choosing M.L.S.
